summary: The on-going war between the canine and feline species is put on hold when they join forces to thwart a rogue cat spy with her own sinister plans for conquest.
cast: James Marsden|Nick Nolte|Christina Applegate|Katt Williams|Bette Midler|Neil Patrick Harris|Sean Hayes|Wallace Shawn|Roger Moore|Joe Pantoliano|Michael Clarke Duncan|Chris O'Donnell|Jack McBrayer|Fred Armisen|Kiernan Shipka|Paul Rodriguez|Elizabeth Daily|Phil LaMarr|Michael Beattie|Jeff Bennett|Malcolm Stewart|Dawn Chubai|Keith Dallas|Pascale Hutton|Grey Griffin|Len Morganti|Betty Phillips|Christopher L. title: Como perros y gatos: La revancha de Kitty Galore
